Title: Q'onzu's Quandary
Description:
You again! Well, you must be here to help, correct? 

Absolutely you are. Why would you not? This development is so exciting. What could these desolating druids be up to?

Fortunately, a few of my friends have infiltrated the druids. I'm sure they have quite the story to tell. 

Go forth, my curious companion and bring back exciting news!
ObjectivesText: Speak to the Flame-Disguised Dreamkin to gather intel on the Druids of the Flame.
